description:
Back Blurb

Dorothy, he Scarecrow, he Tin Woodman and their new companion Flicker must venture far from he Emerald City to a vast, uncharted, frozen domain, to free Princess Ozma from the clutches of the sorcerous Ice King of Oz!

The third volume in the continuing series of brand new, original, illustrated Oz adventures that critics have touted as "The best Oz books since L. Frank Baum."

And don't miss The Enchanted Apples of Oz and The Secret Island of Oz by Eric Shanowar.

character_credits.name: The Good Witch of the North

first_appearance_characters.name: The Good Witch of the North

name: On Stage: The Final Three Stories
He's Just Arrived! Hefty Simpson, Red Circle's Strong Boy
The Destroyer Captures the Nazis Latest Plane!
Please Take Me Back Mr. Smugg!

description: The evolution of the DC Universe continues as the Silver Age of Super Heroes dawns with the appearance of Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman and dozens more in the wake of the disappearance of the Golden Age heroes from active duty. Simultaneously, heroic humans without powers hold up their end of Earth's defense as the Challengers of the Unknown and the Sea Devils emerge to lend a hand!
name: Powers & Abilities!; Snapshot: Resurgence!

description: The Civil War has begun and the Super-Human Registration Act has been passed. Spider-Man convinced by Tony Stark has revealed to the world his secret identity and now all his enemies know he is Peter Parker. With this being common knowledge, the Chameleon orchestrates a plan to go after Peter Parker and the ones he cares about most.
name: TPB

description:
e find the hope they've longed look for. Can a town not yet ravaged by the horrors unleashed on Earth possibly be all it's hoped for? Is there a far more sinister secret behind their newfound safe haven? Even worse, can people forever changed by the worst in humanity ever hope to get back to their old selves? The next chapter of the Walking Dead is set to change everything.

Collects The Walking Dead #67-72
name: Life Among Them

description:
Who or what is Unit 23? Luke Cage must lead his new Thunderbolts deep below on their deadliest mission and face the horrors that mankind can become. While S.H.I.E.L.D. was shut down, a now-missing government squad was charged with guarding a cavern full of impure Terrigen crystals...and if these powerful elements morph Inhumans with wild transformations, what in the world will they do to humans? It's a volatile environment--and a bad time for a challenge to authority from The Juggernaut!

Ghost continues to be attacked by the human-looking female troll from last issue. Crossbones takes her out just in time by shooting her in the ear with a tranquilizer dart. Back at Thunderbolts Tower, they find out from Valkyrie that the girl is Asgardian. Her mother had been captured by the Magzi, the most feral troll tribe, who raised her. Attempts to assimilate the girl, named Gunna, into regular Norse culture were unsuccessful. Valkyrie offers to take her to the new Norse home, but Warden John Walker refuses since she killed U.S. citizens. Valkyrie and Walker argue before Luke Cage suggests they consult Steve Rogers. Valkyrie accepts and leaves Gunna in Walkers custody, and Songbird will orientate her to the Raft when she wakes up.

The next morning, Cage briefs the team on their next mission. A squad of SHIELD agents was dispatched to investigate a supposed new strain of Terrigen crystals, and seal off the cavern if they were present. After the first team didnt return, a U.N. team followed and also failed to return. The Thunderbolts are equipped with oxygen supplies or nose filters to prevent exposure to the Terrigen mists. The team transports to the cavern in New Guinea via Man-Thing. Cage tells Mach V to watch after Man-Thing. The team heads down one tunnel, where sensors indicate the crystals are, while Mach V follows a wandering Man-Thing down another tunnel. Amidst corpses at the crystal site, Ghost finds data gathered by the SHIELD team and learns there is a vein of uranium ore underneath the crystals the uranium is corrupting the Terrigen mists. Suddenly, Cage gets a distress transmission from Mach V and tells the team to go outside and wait for him. Juggernaut and Crossbones argue about whether theyre being tested again, while Moonstone heads after Cage right away. Before leaving, Crossbones finds something left behind by the SHIELD agents. Cage finds a helmetless Mach V being attacked by a large, severely mutated creature. Mach V warns Cage that the creature is toxic. The creature attacks Cage and the toxins blind him. Ghost determines that the creature is the lost SHIELD agents. Moonstone also falls to the creatures. Ghost overrides Mach Vs armor, takes it over, and saves Moonstone. However, there are many more creatures in the cave. Juggernaut plows through several of the creatures, but is covered with their toxic remains and passes out. The conscious members of the team are left to deal with the creatures: Crossbones, now with a minigun left behind by SHIELD; a Ghost-controlled Mach V; and Man-Thing.
name: Don't Feed the Troll

description: It's a race against time -- and eternity! -- as the Mighty Thor and Amadeus Cho try to beat the nefarious PANTHEON to all the pieces of The Ultimate Boon! The next stop on their mythological mystery tour is the realm of the ancient Egyptian gods -- and a no holds barred slugfest with SEKHMET, Goddess of Destruction! But once the sand settles, will the Prince of Power continue to side with the God of Thunder -- or with humanity? Join the New York Time Bestselling authors of INCREDIBLE HERCULES as they continue the tale of Hercs former protg!
name: Our Lady Of Slaughter

description: We're in the home stretch of the biggest superhero launch of the year as Dynamite continues to proudly present Kevin Smith's Green Hornet! The dark forces that took the life of the original Green Hornet now set their sights on young Britt Reid Jr as he takes up his father's war on crime. With the help of the Kato family Britt begins to grow into his role as hero. But a larger, more sinister game is afoot, one that could cost our new Green Hornet not only his life, but the lives of everyone in Century City. From the unproduced screenplay by fan-favorite Kevin Smith, featuring the careful hand of Phil Hester and artist Jonathan Lau! And check out that strong of all-star covers!
name: Episode Six: Wearing O' The Green

description: Kratos' epic quest continues! In this issue, Kratos battles Poseidon, man-eating spiders and most importantly his own heart. He'll also learn it's much harder to kill a monster the second time around

In near future murder has become an illegal, but popular TV show sport. It broadcasted on underground networks and have intense cult following. One female fun and viewer with dark past finds one day finds herself as a new star of this horrifying game. Now he needs to survive, but her past revealed.
name: Red Banned

description:
Twenty years ago they killed her but some things just cant stay dead. And the peaceful town of Hope Falls is about to be torn apart when Helen Gane returns for vengeance, looking no older than the day she died

And some debts can only be paid in blood

Helen Ganes returns after being dead for twenty years. She returns to Hope Falls looking exactly as she did the day she died and looking for vengeance!
name: Homecoming

description: The body count starts as Helen begins her vengeance against her killers while the Angel Michael discovers a painful secret from the Reverend McClusky. Could this be more than a simple murder, two decades back? And can he stop Helens crusade before she falls too far from Heaven?
name: Secrets & Lies

description:
Although there was a Summer Special in 1977, this was the first Sci-Fi Special. It featured new comic strips plus photo features on the latest movies (Kingdom of the Spiders - Empire of the Ants - Warlords of Atlantis) and a two page article on Frank Bellamy and the Dan Dare strip.

Cover: Kevin O'Neill

  • Dan Dare (writer/artist: Garry Leach)
  • Mach Zero - Cyborg Express (Henry Miller - Kevin O'Neill)
  • Rick Random - SOS from Space (part 1) (Harry Harrison - Ron Turner)
  • The Mach Man File (Mike Lake - Trevor Goring)
  • Rick Random - SOS from Space (part 2 - final part) (Harry Harrison - Ron Turner)
  • Judge Dredd - The Purple People Breeder (unknown - Brendan McCarthy)
  • Backcover poster - The Mekon (art: Keith Watson)
name: 2000ad Sci-Fi Special 1978
